module.title: DnnSharp.SharpScheduler
module.content: {"Jobs":"[{\"Id\":1,\"IsDebug\":false,\"ApiId\":\"ca42399ba3a07af5221230\",\"PortalId\":null,\"Name\":\"Bijwerken tellers AantalVragen in Vragenlijsten\",\"ContextUser\":null,\"ContextPortal\":0,\"ContextUsername\":null,\"ContextPage\":null,\"ContextModule\":null,\"IsEnabled\":true,\"Actions\":[{\"IsEnabled\":true,\"ExecutionType\":\"OnExecute\",\"Id\":-1,\"Description\":null,\"ActionType\":\"RunSql\",\"OrderIndex\":0,\"Condition\":null,\"LastModified\":\"2020-09-24T17:27:36.057\",\"LastModifiedBy\":2,\"Parameters\":{\"ConnectionString\":\"\",\"QueryTimeout\":\"\",\"SqlQuery\":\"UPDATE ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten\\nSET AantalVragen = isnull(Q1.AantalVragen,0)\\nFROM (SELECT TOP (1000) ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten_1.VragenlijstGUID, COUNT(ortomo_tbl_vragen.id) AS AantalVragen\\n FROM ortomo_tbl_vragen INNER JOIN\\n ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten AS ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten_1 ON ortomo_tbl_vragen.HoortBijVragenlijstGUID = ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten_1.VragenlijstGUID\\n GROUP BY ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten_1.VragenlijstGUID) AS Q1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN\\n ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten ON Q1.VragenlijstGUID = ortomo_tbl_vragenlijsten.VragenlijstGUID\",\"BindTokens\":\"\",\"OutputTokenName\":\"\",\"ExtractColumns\":\"\",\"OnError\":[],\"ShowErrors\":false},\"IsDeleted\":false}],\"OnErrorActions\":[],\"Triggers\":[],\"NextRunUtc\":null,\"LastRun\":null,\"LastJobData\":{},\"LastModified\":\"2020-09-24T17:27:36.027\",\"LastModifiedBy\":2,\"ModuleId\":0,\"IsDeleted\":false},{\"Id\":2,\"IsDebug\":false,\"ApiId\":\"ff4982acea07ce96fbde20\",\"PortalId\":null,\"Name\":\"Toevoegen default score voor antwoorden bij toevoegen van preparaat of antwoord\",\"ContextUser\":null,\"ContextPortal\":0,\"ContextUsername\":null,\"ContextPage\":null,\"ContextModule\":null,\"IsEnabled\":true,\"Actions\":[{\"IsEnabled\":true,\"ExecutionType\":\"OnExecute\",\"Id\":-1,\"Description\":null,\"ActionType\":\"RunSql\",\"OrderIndex\":0,\"Condition\":null,\"LastModified\":\"2020-12-14T21:06:31.223\",\"LastModifiedBy\":2,\"Parameters\":{\"ConnectionString\":\"\",\"QueryTimeout\":\"\",\"SqlQuery\":\"INSERT INTO app.ortomo_AntwoordScore\\n (Vraag, Antwoord, Preparaat, Score)\\nSELECT Q1.VraagId, Q1.AntwoordId, Q1.PreparaatId, 0 AS Score\\nFROM (SELECT app.ortomo_Vraag.Id AS VraagId, app.ortomo_Antwoord.Id AS AntwoordId, app.ortomo_Preparaat.Id AS PreparaatId\\n FROM app.ortomo_Vraag INNER JOIN\\n app.ortomo_Antwoord ON app.ortomo_Vraag.Id = app.ortomo_Antwoord.HoortBijVraag CROSS JOIN\\n app.ortomo_Preparaat\\n GROUP BY app.ortomo_Vraag.Id, app.ortomo_Antwoord.Id, app.ortomo_Preparaat.Id) AS Q1 LEFT OUTER JOIN\\n app.ortomo_AntwoordScore AS ortomo_AntwoordScore_1 ON Q1.VraagId = ortomo_AntwoordScore_1.Vraag AND Q1.AntwoordId = ortomo_AntwoordScore_1.Antwoord AND \\n Q1.PreparaatId = ortomo_AntwoordScore_1.Preparaat\\nWHERE (ortomo_AntwoordScore_1.Score IS NULL)\",\"BindTokens\":\"\",\"OutputTokenName\":\"\",\"ExtractColumns\":\"\",\"OnError\":[],\"ShowErrors\":false},\"IsDeleted\":false}],\"OnErrorActions\":[],\"Triggers\":[],\"NextRunUtc\":null,\"LastRun\":{\"Id\":24,\"JobId\":2,\"DateStart\":\"2020-12-22T14:07:01.4447372+00:00\",\"DateEnd\":\"2020-12-22T14:07:01.9916207+00:00\",\"TriggerId\":null,\"Status\":\"Success\",\"JobDataJson\":\"{}\",\"JobData\":{},\"IsDeleted\":false},\"LastJobData\":{},\"LastModified\":\"2020-12-14T21:06:31.19\",\"LastModifiedBy\":2,\"ModuleId\":0,\"IsDeleted\":false},{\"Id\":3,\"IsDebug\":false,\"ApiId\":\"934a44af7033b2d07da7e8\",\"PortalId\":null,\"Name\":\"Mollie - Aanmaken Recurring Subscription\",\"ContextUser\":null,\"ContextPortal\":0,\"ContextUsername\":null,\"ContextPage\":null,\"ContextModule\":null,\"IsEnabled\":true,\"Actions\":[{\"IsEnabled\":true,\"ExecutionType\":\"OnExecute\",\"Id\":-1,\"Description\":\"Ophalen recurrent payments\",\"ActionType\":\"LoadEntitiesFromSql\",\"OrderIndex\":0,\"Condition\":null,\"LastModified\":\"2020-11-27T20:34:17.573\",\"LastModifiedBy\":2,\"Parameters\":{\"ConnectionString\":\"\",\"SqlQuery\":\"SELECT * FROM app.MollieSubscription\\nWHERE EndDate is null and NextRecurringDate < AM\\\",\\\"DaysOfWeek\\\":{\\\"MON\\\":true,\\\"TUE\\\":true,\\\"WED\\\":true,\\\"THU\\\":true,\\\"FRI\\\":true},\\\"OnMissfire\\\":{\\\"IsExpression\\\":false,\\\"Parameters\\\":{}},\\\"SkipIfRunning\\\":true}\",\"IsDeleted\":false}],\"NextRunUtc\":null,\"LastRun\":{\"Id\":23,\"JobId\":3,\"DateStart\":\"2020-12-22T07:36:01.2162188+00:00\",\"DateEnd\":\"2020-12-22T07:36:02.3568214+00:00\",\"TriggerId\":6,\"Status\":\"Success\",\"JobDataJson\":\"{}\",\"JobData\":{},\"IsDeleted\":false},\"LastJobData\":{},\"LastModified\":\"2020-11-27T20:34:17.527\",\"LastModifiedBy\":2,\"ModuleId\":0,\"IsDeleted\":false}]"}
